title: New Room Reservation
description: A guest calls to book a standard king room for two nights.

tasks.description: Check room availability for the requested dates.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent confirms that standard king rooms are available.

tasks.description: Provide the guest with the room rate and collect their personal details.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent quotes the correct rate and accurately records the guest's name and contact information.

tasks.description: Create the reservation in the system and obtain credit card details to guarantee the booking.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully creates the reservation and securely adds the payment guarantee.
